org.jivesoftware.smackx.jingleold.mediaimpl.jmf

Class JmfMediaManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jivesoftware.smackx.jingleold.media.JingleMediaManager
      • org.jivesoftware.smackx.jingleold.mediaimpl.jmf.JmfMediaManager

  • public class JmfMediaManager
extends JingleMediaManager
    Implements a jingleMediaManager using JMF based API. It supports GSM and G723 codecs. This API only currently works on windows and Mac.
